price: Yaduhaye urugero[1] yibagirwa ukuremwa kwe, maze aravuga ati “Ni nde wazura aya magufa kandi yarabaye ubuvungukira?”
arabic: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلٗا وَنَسِيَ خَلۡقَهُۥۖ قَالَ مَن يُحۡيِ ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٞ
footnotes: [1] Urugero ruvugwa muri uyu murongo; ni umuntu utaremeraga izuka waje ku Ntumwa y’Imana (Muhamadi), maze afata igufa ryashenye akarivungagura nuko akavuga ati “Ese koko Nyagasani wawe ashobora kuzura nyir’iri gufa?”

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waḍaraba lanā mathalan wanasiya khalqahu qāla man yuḥ'yī al-ʿiẓāma wahiya ramīmun
